README.md:
arXivHaiku
==========

https://twitter.com/arXivHaiku

Haiku drawn directly, and automatically, from the arXiv http://arxiv.org/

Copyright 2012 Simon StJohn-Green, Simon <dot> StJG <at> gmail <dot> com.

Dev instructions
----------------

Dependancies:
- pip install lxml feedparser oauth2 nltk
- Run `import nltk; nltk.download();` in python, and download `cmudict`.
